name: Space Recon
description:
In this exercise I have added 2 additional levels.

  •  Level 1 has three opponents 
  • Level 2 has 4 opponents 
  • Level 3 finally has 5 opponents. 

Sometimes the player is pursued by several opponents. The title of the game was unnamed by me. I was a little surprised that a little more work went into such a small game. I'm only at the beginning with the game development... I'm very excited about what's still to come.
